card_text: 1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters$NGains ATK equal to its Level x 300. Each time a "F.A." Spell/Trap Card or effect is activated: You can increase this card's Level by 1. This card gains the following effect(s), based on its current Level.$N●Level 11 or higher: Cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects.$N●Level 13 or higher: Once per turn: You can target 1 "F.A." monster in your GY; Special Summon it.
